title: Litany In Honour Of Venerable Pauline Jaricot
content:
LITANY IN HONOUR OF
VENERABLE PAULINE JARICOT
(For private use only.)
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
God the Father of Heaven,
have mercy on us.
God the Holy Ghost,
have mercy on us.
Holy Trinity, One God,
have mercy on us.
Holy Mary,
Pray for us.
Venerable Pauline Marie Jaricot,
Faithful imitator of Jesus Christ,
Pray for us.
Faithful to domestic and family duties,
Pray for us.
Faithful adorer of the Most Blessed Sacrament,
Pray for us.
Persecuted to the fullness of martyrdom,
Pray for us.
Entirely detached from perishable possessions,
Pray for us.
Virgin Spouse of Jesus Christ,
Ardent in the praise
of the Infinite Love of the Divine Eucharist,
Pray for us.
Dedicated to the extension of the Kingdom of Jesus Christ
throughout the whole world,
Pray for us.
Undaunted by the cost of personal sacrifice
for the salvation of souls,
Pray for us.
Guided by the motto 'God alone and His greater glory,'
Pray for us.
Pauline,
Whose work was blessed with miraculous success,
Pray for us.
Whose life gave joy to the Hearts of Jesus and Mary,
Pray for us.
Whose life was one of continual prayer,
Pray for us.
Who was the match which lit the fire of faith universally,
Pray for us.
Who knew no compromise,
Pray for us.
For whom no task was too great,
Pray for us.
Who suffered the fury of Hell,
Pray for us.
Who suffered the martyrdom of contradictions,
calumnies and scorn,
Pray for us.
Who was abandoned by all,
Pray for us.
Whom God has loaded with crosses and great graces,
Pray for us.
Whose charity was inexhaustible,
Pray for us.
Who was miraculously cured
through the intercession of St. Philomena,
Pray for us.
Who suffered the loss of every human consolation,
Pray for us.
Who was obedient and mortified,
Pray for us.
Whose trust in God never faltered,
Pray for us.
Who pardoned, loved and prayed
for those who caused her ruin,
Pray for us.
Who united the contemplative life
to an active life of good works,
Pray for us.
Whose sanctity was anchored in absolute submission
to the will and pleasure of thy Divine Master,
Pray for us.
Whose only baggage and treasure upon this earth was the Cross,
Pray for us.
Who suffered ill health with perfect resignation,
Pray for us.
Whose last agony was long and cruel,
Pray for us.
Who hast given thy heart to the Heart of Jesus,
Pray for us.
Who breathed forth thy soul to the Mother of God,
Pray for us.
Heart of Pauline,
Furnace of charity,
Pray for us.
Enlightened guide of souls,
Pray for us.
Comforter of the afflicted,
Pray for us.
Admirable adorer of Jesus in the Most Blessed Sacrament,
Pray for us.
Constant in prayer for the sanctification of the priesthood,
Pray for us.
Purified and tried as purest gold
in the crucible of suffering,
Pray for us.
Burning ceaselessly for the salvation of souls,
Pray for us.
Mother of the Propagation of the Faith,
Pray for us.
Mother of Thy Living Rosary,
Pray for us.
Mother of souls,
Pray for us.
Mother of happy deaths,
Pray for us.
Mother of those who suffer poverty,
Pray for us.
Pauline Marie,
Heroic in thy virtues,
Pray for us.
Heroic in thy suffering,
Pray for us.
Heroic in thy love,
Pray for us.
Faithful and obedient daughter
of the Holy Roman Catholic Church,
Pray for us.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Graciously hear us O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Have mercy on us, O Lord.
Heart of Jesus, hear us.
Heart of Jesus, graciously hear us.
Pray for us, O venerable Pauline Marie Jaricot,
that we may be worthy of the promises of Christ.
Let us Pray:
Almighty and merciful God,
Who has chosen a humble virgin,
Marie Pauline of Jesus Christ,
the poor one of Mary,
to found the great Catholic works
of the Propagation of the Faith
and the Living Rosary,
and Who hast wished in the midst of humiliations,
trials and persecutions to purify her works,
deign to hasten the day when the Church
will recognize publicly her Saintly life.
We pray, that by her example of patience
and love of the Cross,
her life-time prayer
will be realized in its fullness:
Propagation of the Faith in All Its Purity throughout the World!
